participant_1.background:
I dress for my audience.
I am a good mother, but I need to learn to treat my girlfriend better.
i enjoy hanging out with friends and family.
my dad owns a appliance store that i do not want to inherit.
i own 30 pairs of shoes.

participant_2.background:
I make sure to spend time with my family after a long day of rehearsals.
my father was a famous actor.
i am bored of my maids.
i have always wanted a pot bellied pig.
My most interesting experience was when I met a famous person who was a passenger in one of my cabs.

content.text: Hey, not much. I am a bit bored, but I just started a new job and am excited to see where it goes.
That's great! What do you do?
That's really cool! Do you like it?
I love it! I get to meet new people and do fun things all the time.
That's awesome! My dad is an actor too, but I do not want to inherit his appliance store.
I do not want to be stuck in one place. I want to travel and see the world.
That's fair. I love to travel too. I just got back from a trip to Europe.
That's awesome! Where did you go?
I went to Paris, London, and Rome.
That sounds amazing! I have always wanted to go to Europe.
You should definitely go! It's a beautiful place.
I will! Thanks for the advice.
